Detailed Description

Packet that is sent as a reply to a MapRequestPacket.

After the normal header this packet contains
PosSizeComment
REPLY_HEADER_SIZE 4 bytes IP from where the map can be retrieved
+4 2 bytes port to use
+6 2 bytes padding.
+8 4 bytes Map ID
+16 4 bytes Map version
+20 4 bytes Map generator ver

Definition at line 185 of file MapPacket.h.

uint32  mapIP,
uint16  mapPort,

uint32  generatorVersion = MAX_UINT32
) 
 

Use this constructor! Creates a MapReplyPacket by using the corresponding question (a aMapRequestPacket).

Parameters:
requestPacket is the request for this reply.
mapIP The IP from where the map will be sent.
mapPort The port from where the map will be sent.
mapVersion The version of the map according to index.db.
